alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 29 at 4:10PM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern New London and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Southeast Suffolk and Northeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern New London
